medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Abdominal pain started 14 hours prior to presentation, initially above the umbilicus and then migrated to the right lower quadrant (RLQ). Patient endorsed some nausea, but no fevers or emesis. He had diarrhea at baseline and reported some history of changes in stool pattern. He last ate the evening before.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Depression, Irritable Bowel Syndrome with diarrhea (IBS-D)
